data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Karachi, Sind, Pakistan be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Karachi, Sind, Pakistan

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Karachi access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary: On average, 9 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Karachi, Sind, Pakistan.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, 11,937,700 people live in the county of Karachi. Please, give them 2,387 new simple churches this year.
Father, help the 33,286 believers in Karachi to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 11,904,414 lost friends and neighbors.

Father, I pray that the Dholi (Muslim traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Dholi (Muslim traditions) people know you.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Karachi.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Karachi.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Karachi, Sind, Pakistan has a population of 11,937,700.

We estimate Karachi has 33,286 people who might know Jesus, 119,377 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 11,785,037 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Karachi.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.
